actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.

summary.text: Revises the provisions of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act relating to the sale of margarine and oleomargarine in public eating places to: (1) delete provisions restricting the possession of margarine in a form ready for serving; and (2) requires that notice of margarine being served may be made on each separate serving.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act.
